text: @ACTforAmerica @realDonaldTrump Imagine if the president were focused on coronavirus back in January. 130,000 families would like to know why that wasn't a thing. If the Senate had done the right thing, maybe we wouldn't be the laughing stock of the world right now and many people would still have their lives.
